title: Danielle Lloyd puts her feud with Rebekah Vardy behind her as she attends Slimefest in Blackpool
text:
She recently became embroiled in the bitter WAG-war between Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy.

But Danielle Lloyd put the drama behind her as she enjoyed some quality time with her sons at the Nickelodoen Slimefest at Blackpool Pleasure Beach on Saturday.

The former glamour model, 35, oozed glamour in a dark green furry coat as she posed with her boys at the fun event.

Moving on: But Danielle Lloyd put the drama behind her as she enjoyed some quality time with her sons at the Nickelodoen Slimefest at Blackpool Pleasure Beach on Saturday

She teamed her glam outerwear with a tan suede dress and added a pair of black tights and patent black lace-up boots.

Accessorising her stylish look, the TV personality donned a leopard print scarf, a quilted black handbag and wore a VIP lanyard around her neck.

She wore her raven tresses in a poker straight style, while she allowed her natural beauty to shine through with minimal make-up.

The former Big Brother star happily cuddled her boys - Archie, nine, Harry, eight and five-year-old George.

Stylish family: The former glamour model, 35, oozed glamour in a dark green furry coat as she posed with her boys at the fun event

The boys looked adorable in matching outfits, all wearing leather jackets, grey jeans and funky trainers.

Her other son Ronnie, two, was no doubt at home with his father and her husband Michael O’Neill.

Danielle's outing comes after she was spotted visiting her solicitor in Liverpool amid her war of words with Rebekah Vardy.

The star was clad in all-black as she exited the offices following what was thought to be a two hour meeting, after furiously accusing the WAG of having 'a vendetta against her.'

Glamorous: She teamed her glam outerwear with a tan suede dress and added a pair of black tights and patent black lace-up boots

Danielle has spoken in length about the recent row between Rebekah, 37, and Coleen Rooney, 33, after she accused the wife of Jamie Vardy of leaking stories to the press.

It is currently unclear exactly why Danielle was seeking legal counsel, but it seems appropriated timed following her accusations against Rebekah.

The mother-of-four was wrapped up in a black faux fur coat and a slogan t-shirt and finished her look with simple black leggings and matching trainers.

MailOnline has contacted representatives for Rebekah Vardy for more information.

Fashionable kids: The boys looked adorable in matching outfits, all wearing leather jackets, grey jeans and funky trainers

On Tuesday Danielle accused of Rebekah of having a 'vendetta' against her, after the pair's previous run-ins.

She told New magazine: 'I've had my own run-ins with Becky and she hasn't been very nice about me- I'm not going to disclose why we fell out but Becky knows what she did.

'It was like she had a vendetta against me and it's weird because before I'd even met her, when she was unknown, she actually contacted me on Instagram and asked me to hang out.

'I thought she wanted to be friends and then later I felt she turned against me so when Coleen posted her message I couldn't wait to post my rat comment, for me, it was karma.'

Speak out: Danielle has spoken in length about the recent row between Rebekah, 37, and Coleen Rooney, 33, after she accused the wife of Jamie Vardy of leaking stories to the press

MailOnline has contacted Rebekah Vardy's representatives for comment.

This comes amid reports that many of the WAGs have now distanced themselves from Rebekah and are busy 'scrutinising' past conversations with her, following the fallout from her feud with Coleen.

One of Rebekah's supporters came in Nicola McLean, who has staunchly defended her and claimed it is dangerous for Coleen to put so much pressure on a pregnant woman - something some of Danielle's followers echoed.

Danielle however was keen to reiterate that the pregnancy was not a factor.

She wrote: '[Rebekah] was ok piping up about me before if she wants to give it she needs to take it! Someone on her account sold stories on my mate end of pregnant or not! Coleen was pregnant when some of these stories came out'.

Feud: Danielle (R) reignited her war with Rebekah Vardy after her friend Coleen Rooney's (L) elaborate sting in which she accused the WAG of leaking stories (pictured 2014)

Amid the drama last week, Danielle appeared on TV to express her opinion on the WAG war, and hinted she had a similar experience with Rebekah in the past.

However Jamie's wife was quick to retaliate, as she took to Twitter to claim that Danielle's admission was 'utter b******s' and their feud was sparked by her refusal to try and find Danielle a man following her split from Jamie [O'Hara].

In what has become a War of the WAGs, Coleen released an incredible social media statement aimed at Rebekah in which she revealed she set up an elaborate sting on Instagram to 'catch' who was leaking fake stories.

Subsequently Nicola issued a warning to Coleen about stressing out an expectant mother, as she said: 'Coleen doing this is not okay... Something is going to happen to a pregnant woman and a baby!'

Coleen's dramatic revelation enthralled Britain and sparked an angry denial from pregnant Rebekah, who said 'I don't need the money’ and pointed out other people have had access to her Instagram account.

The wife of Jamie Vardy has now given an interview with The Daily Mail, in which she insisted arguing with Coleen is akin to rowing 'with a pigeon.'
description: The former glamour model, 35, put the WAG drama behind her as she enjoyed some quality time with her sons at the Nickelodoen Slimefest at Blackpool Pleasure Beach on Saturday.
